Content.Text:
<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Hmm? What's that? I look familiar?
<PAGE>
Erm, you might have seen me on TV, I suppose.
Because I'm...in television.
<PAGE>
And you're the <MYNAME> who moved to this
town recently, aren't you? You're a bit of a
celebrity yourself!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Let me introduce myself. I'm <BLUE>Lillie</BLUE>. My family
runs an inn around here.
<PAGE>
Always nice to see someone close to my own
age around town. It's very good to meet you!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Are you...all right?
There are bags under your eyes, is all...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm a morning person out of necessity. When
your family runs an inn and you're in TV, a lot of
things happen bright and early!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning. Ready for another day of hard
work?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello. You seem awfully busy today! Have you
eaten? And are you eating enough? With all the
rushing around you do, you need those calories!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmm... With the clouds moving as they are,
something tells me tomorrow's weather is going
to be... *grumble* ...not good.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Whaaaa?! <MYNAME>! Sorry, I was...lost in
thought. Didn't mean to shout!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. What are you doing here?
Taking a stroll? Or are you looking for someone?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening. Tonight's weather is looking to be
nearly perfect, isn't it?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa, look at the time! The day sure does go by
quickly, doesn't it?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? What are you doing? It's night time, you
know. You should go home!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
G-good morning. You look chipper for this hour
of the morning. That's...well, good for you!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
G-good morning! Today is a v-very nice
day...isn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...Wait, what am I babbling about? Let's, um...
How about we start this conversation over?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hi there, <MYNAME>. It's... It's good to see
you...in the morning.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. You look pretty busy, but try
not to push yourself too hard. You don't want to
make me worried, do you?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Whoa?! Y-you startled me...!
<PAGE>
See, I was just thinking about you, and then the
real you showed up, and...n-never mind!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh? You came see me? Th-thank you... Awww,
look at me, I'm already blushing!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. You look like you're
busy. Are you holding up okay? Remember to
take care of yourself.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, good evening! Didn't think I'd get to see you
today... Um... Thanks for coming to visit...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evening. He he, I think I'm gonna have a
sweet dream tonight. Why...? Um, because...it's
a secret!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Did you sleep well
last night?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, good morning. Um...do you happen to
remember a few hours ago?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>You kept holding me tight like a body pillow...
Um, if you don't remember, no worries!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning. I wonder what's in store for us
today. Something sweet, I hope!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. You look pretty busy this
morning. Are you all right? Don't push yourself
too hard.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
My dad invited us to stop by and have dinner.
We should take him up on that.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, do you have anything in mind for
dinner tonight? I don't really know what to
make, so I'll let you decide.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
*phew* Thanks for talking to me. I thought
maybe you'd been giving me the silent treatment
for some reason.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You worked hard today, didn't you? Take a load
off, and I'll make you some tea.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You must be tired today. Take a rest and let me
worry about the housework.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Not a cloud in sight, no wind to speak of, and I
doubt we'll see any change till nightfall. Isn't it
lovely?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I don't like rainy days because they make it hard
to dry the laundry. How about you?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's hot today, isn't it...? Let's drink a lot of water
so we don't get heat stroke.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Summer heat pushes winds through the
atmosphere in a way that causes rain and
typhoons. Did you know that?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a beautiful day, but the air gets dry when it's
sunny in the autumn. Careful not to start any
fires.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This rain is chilly, isn't it? Not surprising, with
this cold front on the way. Winter is coming...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's cold today, isn't it? But don't overuse your
heater, or you'll make the room too dry.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>When the sun's out like this, you can get your
place warm enough just by leaving the curtains
open.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Snow is so beautiful. When it snows like this, I
get so excited that I don't feel cold at all.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Y-you shouldn't go out in this weather...!! What
if some random flying object hits you in the
head?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What? You came all the way here in this snow?
Y-you could've gotten hurt, badly!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This weather's too dangerous to walk around in.
What do you say we just sit back at home?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, we can't go out in THIS weather. Do you
want to just get some rest today?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
He he, <MYNAME>. You're all smiles. Maybe
because you're seeing someone?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, sorry. I heard some people talking about it.
But congratulations!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Have you been to this restaurant before? The
food's so delicious.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The food here is good, but the desserts are the
best! You've gotta try the cake!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? Am I...close with Angela? Well, yeah,
we've been friends since we were little kids.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I think we started playing together when we
were both in diapers, and we still do. We're
BFFs!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? You think my room is cute? Really?
Well...thanks, I guess!
<PAGE>
Oh, but I haven't cleaned it particularly well, so
please don't look too closely at anything.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whenever I'm here, I always feel at
ease...especially after coming back from the
city, or getting out of a business meeting.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There's an awful lot of cute animals here, isn't
there? Makes this place feel all homey and
inviting...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I never considered living on a mountain before,
but it does have some benefits...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mmmm, smell those flowers! Isn't it wonderful?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whenever I come here, I can hear the gentle
noise of the water wheel. Makes me feel all
calm and relaxed.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whenever I come here, I can hear the gentle
noise of the water wheel. Makes me feel all
calm and relaxed.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whenever I come here, I can hear the gentle
noise of the water wheel. Makes me feel all
calm and relaxed.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This isn't the most tech-savvy or progressive
town in the world, but there's still so much to
love about it.
<PAGE>
I was born and raised here, and it'll always be
my home.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm a social butterfly, so I like seeing all these
new people in town. You can never have too
many conversation partners!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. How do you like the town?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'll help you out any way I can, so let me know if
you have any problems or questions.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good food makes you happy, right?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...Except when you eat too much, and then you
regret it. I've gotta watch out for that.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whether I'm on or off the clock, I'm always
looking up at the sky and tracking changes in
the weather conditions.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My younger sister, Melanie, is...mature for her
age. I don't know where she learns the things
she picks up, sometimes.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm on all kinds of shows besides the weather,
y'know. Sometimes, it's hard to know which
gigs to take and which not to.
<PAGE>
I want to get my name out there and advance
my career, but I also want to focus mainly on
weather forecasting. Hmm...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A lot of things happened back when I first took
this job...
<PAGE>
But all things considered, I think I made the right
choice to stick with it. What I do at work helps
people.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>You know what I like about you? You treat me
like a real person and not just some character on
TV.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...I really appreciate that. You're good to me.
Let's always be this good to each other, yeah?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Is this what dating is supposed to be...?
<MYNAME>, I don't understand...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, I... Nothing. Never mind.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
You know, um, I've never really dated anybody
before, so...I'm gonna have to follow your lead
on some of this stuff...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Okay, so, um, apparently everybody in the whole
town knows we're dating now...
<PAGE>
My dad just smiled and started putting together
this whole celebration feast...I don't know if I
can take all this!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You know, dating you has started to give me
some idea of what it's like to be in a
relationship...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...Huh? It's getting better?! Wh-what does that
mean, exactly...?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So out of all the girls you could've gone out
with, um...what made you want to be with me?
I mean...what do you like about me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Huh? "What do I like about you?" No fair! I asked
you first! But, um...well, I like everything about
you...
<PAGE>
I mean... Aw, just forget I brought it up in the
first place!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
H-hey, <MYNAME>! Um...Melanie told me I
should share my feelings with you more often...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R><FACE_LOVE>So...I just wanted you to know that I l-l-lov...
Aw, I can't! Sorry!! Never mind!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I always thought getting married would mean
living happily ever after. Was that just a fairy
tale? This is so hard... <MYNAME>...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I don't know if I can go on loving you... What
should I do?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...Um, <MYNAME>...I believe in you. ...In us.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Before I married you, I thought my heart would
explode just from staying with someone I love all
day...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...And now I think that might actually happen!
What should I do? My heart! What if it just goes
BOOM all of a sudden?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When we first got married, I was debating
whether to quit my job and become a
housewife...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But it seems I love my job more than I
thought...so I'll do my best to be both at the
same time.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I hear it's actually pretty rare to marry your first
love.
<PAGE>
If that's true, I'm...well, I'm even luckier than I
thought.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Listen, <MYNAME>, I just...I want you to know
how happy I am to have you for my first and
only love.
<PAGE>
I was brand new to this when you found me,
but you've supported me every step of the way.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R><FACE_LAUGH>I really appreciate that. And...I'll love you forever.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Ahh! ...S-sorry! I was just... I was really jumpy
just now.
<PAGE>
...D-don't worry. I'm fine...! So wh-what's up?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Erm... Don't make that kind of face in front of
me, please. I'm okay now, so don't worry. Let's
just get along as friends from now on.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Am I...dreaming right now...? I can't believe
we've got another chance... I'm so happy...!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I can't believe we're getting married. I'm so
happy, I feel like my heart is gonna just stop.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm not perfect! But I'll do my best as your wife,
so let's build a happy family together.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
We're really going to have a kid... Boy or girl, I
wonder? Squee!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
If I stroke my tummy like this, it reminds me of
when Melanie was born. Do I still remember
how to change a diaper...?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I still doesn't quite feel real that I'm about to have
a baby, but I get goosebumps when I think
about how close it is...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm so glad our children were both born healthy.
I bet you are too, right? Let's be the best parents
we can be.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
When I see our kids crawling from behind, it's
the cutest thing ever. I just want to pick 'em up
and give 'em a biiig hug.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Our kids both turned out really sweet and kind,
didn't they?
<PAGE>
Let's keep on raising them with lots of love.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Oh, this is my absolute favorite! Thank you very
much! I love chocolate ice cream! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, thank you! I really like this.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, how did you know what I like? Thank
you!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Can I really have this? Thank you.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Is this for me? Erm...th-thank you...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? A present for me? But this is... Um, never
mind. Thank you.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Ehe-he... Erm... Th-thank you... I'll try to eat it
without gagging...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, it's shining. Is this for me? Thank you.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I've never seen anything twinkle like this. Does it
taste any different...? I hope it does.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, nothing. I was just talking to myself. Thank
you.
Let's not give her a present for now.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? A present for me? I'd...feel bad if I said
yes. You should keep it.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Um...I really appreciate a present from you...but
I'm happy enough just to talk to you again.
<PAGE>
Please save it for next time. Thank you, though.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey, <MYNAME>... Are you trying to butter me
up? I hope not, because that would just
be...sad.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Look, it's good that we're talking again, but I'd
rather just go on talking than accept a present
from you right now.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? You just gave me a present a little while
ago, and I'd feel bad if you gave me too many.
Thanks for the thought, though.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Huh? You already gave me a present earlier...
Too many all at once, and I might have a heart
attack. So, um, I'm good...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You already gave me a present today! I can't take
that one too! ...But, um, thanks for showing me
you care, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Oh, is this for me? Best birthday present ever!
<PAGE>
Thank you very much. I'll enjoy it!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, this is great. A birthday present for me?
Thank you!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Huh? A birthday present for me? Wow, really?
Thank you!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Kind of gives you a little tickle when you get a
birthday present, yeah? He he, thank you.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is...a birthday present? Erm...thanks.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you. ...You know, it really is the thought
that counts, especially on someone's birthday.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>I, um, kind of wish you hadn't gotten me
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> for my birthday... Th-
thank you, though...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, it's twinkling! This is the perfect birthday
present. Thank you.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Is this really for me? M-maybe you should
keep it for yourself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I see. If you say so, I'll take it. Thank you for
such a rare thingy.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Aww, what a cuuute little bunny rabbit! When I
was little, I found a bunny and brought him
home, but Dad said no pets allowed, so...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, that's cute! He he, the tail is so fluffy.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, that's an ermine, isn't it? Oh, you like to be
hugged? Yeeeah, you like to be hugged,
don'tcha?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
A sifaka! Look at those round eyes and those
pink widdle cheeks!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, oh! Is that a penguin? They're soooo cute!
Come here, little penguin! I want to give you a
big hug!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
He he, you're a good little guy, aren't you? Oh, I
have a banana! Here, you want it?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Parrots have such gorgeous feathers, don't they?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Aww, you're so cute, aren't you? You wanna
snack? Oops, I don't have any on me right now.
Sorry...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, you're so cute. Wow, your fur is so fluffy...!
Aww... I just can't stop touching it.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Chicks are so cute when they're tiny, aren't they?
Eat up and grow bigger, little one!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Some people say chickens can't memorize
things, but this one clearly knows the pecking
order, doesn't it?
<PAGE>
Just think, if the chicken can do it, so can you!
He he!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whoa. He he, it tickles. This dog is so friendly.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That dog has such a big, round tummy. It's
cute, but not healthy at all.
<PAGE>
I've got an idea. Why don't we exercise together,
and we can both stay healthy that way?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder what this dog likes to do for fun. I
can't play with you right now, 'cause I have
work, but let's play soon, okay?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, this dog's gotten big! ...And by that, I
mean "fat"... We should both get some exercise,
huh, doggy?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you're so cute. He he, the cat's purring.
Aww, yeah, you like being petted, don't you?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Has this cat gotten a little too fluffy? You should
play with it some more. Maybe we can play in
the evening sometime, okay?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
He he, this kitty's fur is so cute! I can't stop
petting it...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, this cat's fur is getting kinda messy. Did
you get too fluffy, kitty? Okay, let's both get into
shape together!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, this is for the Flower Fair, right? Thank you.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Huh? I-is this for me? Oh, right. Today's the
Flower Fair... Th-thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh, is this a Flower Fair present...? Thank you,
<MYNAME>. I'm so flattered.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like White Day because of all the snacks! <RED>∀</RED>
Thank you! I'll enjoy every single bite!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh, you're giving me a snack for White Day?
Thank you. You're so sweet!
<PAGE>
But I might not be able to eat it. It's too
precious...
<PAGE>
N-nothing. Never mind!!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, this is...a White Day treat? Even now that
we're married, you still go the extra mile for
me... That means a lot. Thank you!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's a pretty feather. What kind of bird
does that come from?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Whaaat?! I-I wasn't ready for this... I think I'd
have a heart attack right now if I said yes!
<PAGE>
L-let's please...take some time here! S-sorry!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Hm... Whaaat?! You... You wanna marry me?!
<PAGE>
H-hang on! Let's go somewhere else. I'd be way
too embarrassed to talk about this if anybody
were listening...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I-It's okay. I've already made up my mind. You
don't have to keep showing me that. Please put
it away...!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
He he, every time I look at that, I always
remember our proposal. Oh, look at me. I'm
blushing all over again...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, listen, I heard a rumor you've been showing
our blue feather to other girls. Is that true?
<PAGE>
I...didn't know you're the kind of person who
would do that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oh, y-you didn't mean anything by it? Really?
Phew, that's a relief. I'm sorry I doubted you.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's a nice ring. I bet it would go with
anything you wanna wear.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Huh? You...like me? Then that ring means...
Um, can we go someplace a little quieter?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh, looking at that makes me blush all over
again.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, that brings back memories. Of me being all
young and awkward...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But you've always been so patient with me, and
thanks to that, here we are today.
<PAGE>
I really appreciate all your support, <MYNAME>.
...I love you.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey, listen, I heard a rumor you've been showing
our ring to other girls. Is that true?
<PAGE>
